casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 4, 2007

[Cite as 12/04/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-6441.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0619. State ex rel. Angelo Benedetti, Inc. v. Indus. Comm.

Franklin App. No. 06AP-165. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of the joint motion to refer this case back to mediation,

It is ordered by the court that this motion is granted.

The court refers this case to mediation under S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(6) and stays the briefing schedule for this case until further notice.
